#iDocIt! Milestones

= Roadmap =

This document describes the iDocIt! milestones, their objectives and release dates.


==Milestone #1==

*Planned released date:* 2011/07/01

*Objectives:*
 *iDocIt! runs in a stable and easy useable manner
 *Created documentation could be exported to HTML
 *iDocIt! provides a set of thematic grids.

==Milestone #2==
 *Documentation could be exported to professional formats in a clear manner
